00027 #include <set>
00028 #include "parserstate.h"

00030 using namespace cfp;
00031 
00032 std::vector<ElementGroup::ParseFunc> 
00033         ElementGroup::mAddTokenFunctions;
00034 
00035 ElementGroup::ElementGroup()
00036         : mLastElementProperty(NO_PROPERTY)
00037 {
00038         if (mAddTokenFunctions.size() != Token::TYPE_NONE+1)
00039         {
00040                 mAddTokenFunctions.clear();
00041                 mAddTokenFunctions.push_back(&ElementGroup::addTokenSymbol);
00042                 mAddTokenFunctions.push_back(&ElementGroup::addTokenGroup);
00043                 mAddTokenFunctions.push_back(&ElementGroup::addTokenInt);
00044                 mAddTokenFunctions.push_back(&ElementGroup::addTokenFloat);
00045                 mAddTokenFunctions.push_back(&ElementGroup::addTokenNone);
00046         }
00047 }

00080 void 
00081 ElementGroup::add(const CompoundGroupElement& e)
00082 {
00083         mF.insert(mF.end(), e);
00084 }
00085 
00086 void 
00087 ElementGroup::addGroup(const ElementGroup& eg)
00088 {
00089         fiterator i = adobe::trailing_of(
00090                         mF.insert(mF.end(), CompoundGroupElement(1.0, true)));
00091         mF.insert(i, adobe::child_begin(eg.mF.end()),
00092                       adobe::child_end(eg.mF.end()));
00093 }
00094 
00095 const Compound&
00096 ElementGroup::flatList(void) const
00097 {
00098         return mList;
00099 }
00100 
00101 // set of elements without group feature (for outside use)
00102 typedef std::set<CompoundElement> Set;
00103 
00104 void 
00105 addToSet(Set& s, CompoundElement& e)
00106 {
00107         Set::iterator it = s.find(e);
00108         if (it != s.end()) 
00109         {
00110                 double coef = it->coefficient();
00111                 e.setCoefficient(coef + e.coefficient());
00112                 // we must not modify the element in the set
00113                 s.erase(it);
00114         } 
00115         bool success = s.insert(e).second;
00116         if (!success) {
00117                 // what to do ? at least tell about it.
00118                 std::cerr << "Could not insert into std::map!" << std::endl;
00119         }
00120 }
00121 
00122 void 
00123 ElementGroup::flatten(void)
00124 {
00125         std::vector<double> coef_stack;
00126         Set set;
00127 
00128         mList.clear();
00129         diterator f = diterator(mF.begin());
00130         diterator l = diterator(mF.end());
00131         while(f != l) 
00132         {
00133                 // ignore group nodes add multiply their coef
00134                 if (f->isGroup()) 
00135                 {
00136                         size_t depth = 0;
00137                         if (f.depth() > 0) depth = f.depth();
00138                         if (coef_stack.size() > depth)
00139                         {
00140                                 coef_stack.pop_back();
00141                         } else {
00142                                 double prev_coef = 1.0;
00143                                 if (!coef_stack.empty()) {
00144                                         prev_coef = coef_stack.back();
00145                                 }
00146                                 coef_stack.push_back( prev_coef * f->coefficient() );
00147                         }
00148                 } else { // add elements and multiply their coefficients 
00149                          // with accumulated group coefficients
00150                         double coef = 1.0;
00151                         if (!coef_stack.empty()) {
00152                                 coef = coef_stack.back();
00153                         }
00154                         CompoundElement e(*f);
00155                         e.setCoefficient( e.coefficient() * coef );
00156                         addToSet(set, e);
00157                         f = adobe::trailing_of(f);
00158                 }
00159                 f++;
00160         }
00161         copy(set.begin(), set.end(), back_inserter(mList));
00162 }
00163 
00164 std::ostream& 
00165 std::operator<<(std::ostream& o, const cfp::ElementGroup& eg)
00166 {
00167         ElementGroup::forest::const_iterator first = eg.mF.begin();
00168         ElementGroup::forest::const_iterator last = eg.mF.end();
00169         while( first != last )
00170         {
00171                 if (first.edge() == adobe::forest_leading_edge)
00172                 {
00173                         if (first->isGroup()) 
00174                                 o << "(";
00175                         else 
00176                                 o << first->toMarkup();
00177                 }
00178                 else
00179                 {
00180                         if (first->isGroup()) {
00181                                 o << ")";
00182                                 if (first->coefficient() != 1.0) 
00183                                         o << "<sub>" << first->coefficient() << "</sub>";
00184                         }
00185                 }
00186                 first++;
00187         }
00188         return o;
00189 }
